// NOTES
// x⋅ is the postset i.e: { d | <o,d> ∈ x.edges }

FindAllSolutionsForChoiceGraph(g)
  S = Ø                                // All solution combinations
  C = tarjan(g)                        // Find strongly connected components in the graph
  X = Ø                                // Grouped solutions for each scc
  for c∈C                              // 
    X = X ∪ FindAllSolutionsForSCC(c)  // Find the solutions for the scc
  return AllPermutationsOf(X)          // All combinations of solutions for all the sccs

FindAllSolutionsForSCC(c)              //
  S = Ø                                //
  for n∈c                              //
  	S = S ∪ FindSolution(n,Ø)          //
  return S                             //

FindSolution(n,S)                      //
  n.visited = true                     //
  if |{ x | x ∈ n⋅ ∧ x ∈ S }| = 0      //
    S = S ∪ {n}                        //
  for x∈n⋅                             //
    if x.visited = true                //
      continue                         //
    FindSolution(x,S)                  //
  return S                             //
